text: Dragon General Fu Yuanshan will surely rebuild the Great Bastion, isolate Chaos, and restore peace to Grand Cathay.

Tzeentch successfully triggered a series of upheavals in Grand Cathay. Miao Ying and Zhao Ming, suspecting each other of Chaos corruption, went to war. The Nan-Yang rebels besieged Wei-Jin, attempting to eliminate the last obstacle - Fu Yuanshan's army stationed in Po Mu. Yurik breached the Great Bastion and marched inward, while Fu Yuanshan's lone army was cut off by Chaos.\\nNow, Fu Yuanshan must break through the numerous obstacles of Chaos, rebuild the Great Bastion, defend the land and its people, and restore peace to the Grand Cathayan Empire.
